attributes.action: Do not create a National Landscapes Service
attributes.additional_details: We believe our efficient and locally-based National Park Authorities should be able to carry on doing their current job without interference.
attributes.background: The Government's Landscapes review proposed bringing National Parks together, served by a shared National Landscapes Service (NLS).
